content: I can't seem to configure my Zulip streams anymore. The (Windows) client just shows a waiting icon, the list of streams never appears. Settings are also unailable. Anyone know how I can fix this?
it means the local zulip store is corrupt. I've had to re-install it before
Hmm, I uninstalled Zulip, deleted the data folder and then reinstalled. But I stil have the same issue... :/ is there some hidden data folder?
Finally managed to update streams & settings via the web interface. Windows desktop client picks up the changes. But I still can't manage streams from within the desktop client. Oh well.
